page.title: 12Royston Fire Station
page.content: Royston has a modern fire station. There are two engines, an old one and a new one. Each engine acts as a large pump to pump water at 1000 gallons a minute .Each engine is bright red with a flashing blue lamp and a siren .The engines carry all sorts of equipment, hoses, ladders, a spare pump, tools, ropes, breathing apparatus and much else.Royston's firemen wear yellow helmets and trousers and a black duffel coat and boots. The firemen put out different kinds of fires, houses,grass, chemicals and road accidents.They do many other jobs,such as rescuing people,draining ponds and helping at car crashes. Every day they check the fire engines.They wash them down and check that there's enough water and diesel fuel and they drill every day too.
